protocol_name: Mouse Tissue Fixation with Paraformaldehyde for Fluorescent Reporter Mice
protocol_name_html: Mouse Tissue Fixation with Paraformaldehyde for Fluorescent Reporter Mice
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"464o","text":"Fixation of mouse tissues for either histology or fluorescence microscopy is an essential first step in tissue preparation. In this protocol, we outline a reliable method for fixation and perfusion of mice for tissue histology or microscopy. Tissues prepared by this method can be used downstream as FFPE sections, cryosections for fluorescence microscopy, or tissue clearing for whole tissue imaging. For mice with transgenic fluorescent reporters, it is especially important that the tissues are preserved properly to ensure that the signal of the fluorescent reporter can be imaged. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
protocol_affiliation: La Jolla Institute for Immunology,La Jolla Institute for Allergy and Immunology
keywords: Fixation, Mouse, Tissue preparation, Histology, Microscopy
authors: Paola Marcovecchio,Sara McArdle,Zbigniew Mikulski,Angela Denn,katarzyna dobaczewska

status_info: We use this protocol in our group and it is working

steps.data: {"blocks":[{"key":"6do1c","text":"Prepare 1.6% PFA in PBS (at least   per mouse, half to be used during perfusion, half to be used as storage buffer overnight) MAKE THIS FRESH, DO NOT USE ANYTHING OLDER THAN 24 HOURS. Also, make sure PFA has been stored away from light, this will degrade it.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":34,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]},{"key":"92hk0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"1htva","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":0,"guid":"D3B82060E93811E8AEE7CF9553F7A69E","amount":"20","unit":2,"label":"","step_guid":"E2439A3B89CA41909B96D69A8E7E0077"}}],"guid":"E2439A3B89CA41909B96D69A8E7E0077","id":683408,"previous_id":null,"previous_guid":null,"section":""}

{"blocks":[{"key":"flnim","text":"Sacrifice the mouse with CO2. As soon as the mouse has stopped breathing, begin the procedure.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":27,"length":1,"style":"sub"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"DFD6801EF45746CB81B0EAFAB06A897B","id":683410,"previous_id":683409,"previous_guid":"15EFB50101994A9BA69E99E661927A39","section":""}

{"blocks":[{"key":"flp3c","text":"Dissect open the thoracic cavity, taking care not to puncture the heart with the scissors or forceps.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"37E152DF04B24ED7A4DD70BA04B24E54","id":683411,"previous_id":683410,"previous_guid":"DFD6801EF45746CB81B0EAFAB06A897B","section":""}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7ll4k","text":"Fill a 10mL syringe with  , attach needle to syringe.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":25,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]},{"key":"3sgp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":0,"guid":"3EBCDF90E9E811E8AA8D5DC1BC92DE80","amount":"10","unit":2,"label":"PBS with 2mM EDTA","step_guid":"9E636A41703546F393EA36333FCDE5C9"}}],"guid":"9E636A41703546F393EA36333FCDE5C9","id":683412,"previous_id":683411,"previous_guid":"37E152DF04B24ED7A4DD70BA04B24E54","section":""}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cfhp2","text":"Insert needle into mouse\u2019s right ventricle (left side of heart when looking at the dissected mouse from your perspective). Slowly perfuse mouse until lungs turn white and liver has turned brown (instead of red).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"6E60043160024B83BBA3EB0A5217DA16","id":683413,"previous_id":683412,"previous_guid":"9E636A41703546F393EA36333FCDE5C9","section":""}

{"blocks":[{"key":"qaqp","text":"Fill the syringe with  . Repeat perfusion. Mouse should appear stiff at the end of this perfusion.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":22,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]},{"key":"coh8t","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":0,"guid":"54D3EEE0E9E811E8AA8D5DC1BC92DE80","amount":"10","unit":2,"label":"1.6% PFA in PBS","step_guid":"0D9B7A6040A1434CB5F57BB88C9DC5CD"}}],"guid":"0D9B7A6040A1434CB5F57BB88C9DC5CD","id":683414,"previous_id":683413,"previous_guid":"6E60043160024B83BBA3EB0A5217DA16","section":""}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7nmbd","text":"Remove tissue of interest carefully so that marks are not made in the tissue.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"69DF6F473E8249E5AF6A63ADB721E06D","id":683415,"previous_id":683414,"previous_guid":"0D9B7A6040A1434CB5F57BB88C9DC5CD","section":""}

{"blocks":[{"key":"tfkm","text":"Place tissue in   in either 15 or 50mL conical (depending on how large the tissue is).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":16,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]},{"key":"c3bi0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":0,"guid":"679D0BB0E9E811E8AA8D5DC1BC92DE80","amount":"10","unit":2,"label":"remaining 1.6% PFA in PBS","step_guid":"E26CFD3234E9442F8CC800FFB5B36F1F"}}],"guid":"E26CFD3234E9442F8CC800FFB5B36F1F","id":683416,"previous_id":683415,"previous_guid":"69DF6F473E8249E5AF6A63ADB721E06D","section":""}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5aa","text":"For larger, thicker tissues, leave at room temperature overnight ( - ) in a dark place or covered well in foil. For smaller tissues (i.e. lymph nodes) or for tissues that require antibody staining, fix at room temperature for a few hours (2-8, depending on downstream application).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":66,"length":1,"key":0},{"offset":68,"length":1,"key":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"31vk1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"b8v4t","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":0,"guid":"78C68240E9E811E8AA8D5DC1BC92DE80","duration":57600,"label":"","step_guid":"B21D4FAFDE014CC6A2DC4DF1E5FE7808"}},{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":0,"guid":"7C8CB200E9E811E8AA8D5DC1BC92DE80","duration":72000,"label":"","step_guid":"B21D4FAFDE014CC6A2DC4DF1E5FE7808"}}],"guid":"B21D4FAFDE014CC6A2DC4DF1E5FE7808","id":683417,"previous_id":683416,"previous_guid":"E26CFD3234E9442F8CC800FFB5B36F1F","section":""}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9dbjm","text":"Wash with PBS 1x the next day, 3 times. Use at least   (or more) to wash the tube with the fixed tissue in it. Let tissue sit in fresh PBS wash about   each time in Place in   until ready to use.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":53,"length":1,"key":0},{"offset":150,"length":1,"key":1},{"offset":174,"length":1,"key":2}],"data":[]},{"key":"1lejj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"6bu6g","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"iktb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":0,"guid":"20D1C3F0E9E911E8AA8D5DC1BC92DE80","amount":"10","unit":2,"label":"","step_guid":"1FBC3476CFEF42338B707351B11CCC02"}},{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":0,"guid":"882D6140E9E811E8AA8D5DC1BC92DE80","duration":1200,"label":"","step_guid":"1FBC3476CFEF42338B707351B11CCC02"}},{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":0,"guid":"23E852C0E9E911E8AA8D5DC1BC92DE80","temperature":"4","unit":10,"label":"","step_guid":"1FBC3476CFEF42338B707351B11CCC02"}}],"guid":"1FBC3476CFEF42338B707351B11CCC02","id":683418,"previous_id":683417,"previous_guid":"B21D4FAFDE014CC6A2DC4DF1E5FE7808","section":""}
